project.name: glep
project.author: Grant Goodyear
project.description: The GLEP project manages Gentoo Linux Enhancement Proposals.

longdescription.p: The GLEP project solicits, collects, maintains, and shepherds proposals for substantially enhancing Gentoo Linux. Any user or developer may construct and submit a GLEP for consideration by the GLEP editors. Because GLEPs are kept in CVS, GLEPs constitute a permanent record of proposals designed to enhance Gentoo Linux.
For more information, see GLEP 1 and GLEP 2.
